## Source: ossf-package-analysis (cea9288d5ccaeab5628ba7daabd3ee451f5873469598fa556bde54ec77112648)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'intl-tel-input-utils' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
